Title: Bob Dake Named Principal at Sterling Organization
Summary: Sterling Organization ('Sterling'), a vertically integrated private equity real estate investment firm headquartered in West Palm Beach, Florida, is pleased to announce that Bob Dake has become a Principal of the Firm.

Title: InvestChile Forum Attracts Record US$9 Billion in Investment Projects
Summary: Representatives of more than 100 companies from 28 countries will meet in Santiago May 15-17. The forum is the largest of its kind held in the country. Companies will participate with more than 60 projects associated with the creation of 3,000 permanent jobs.
